findings.description: CORS misconfiguration allowing arbitrary origins with credentials enabled can allow malicious sites to read sensitive data from authenticated users' sessions.
findings.exploitation_steps: Create malicious webpage that makes XMLHttpRequest to https://www.plex.tv/wp-json/wp/v2/pages/20856 with credentials. If user is logged into Plex, the malicious site can read the response data including potentially sensitive information from the WordPress API endpoint.
